response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14500}
